CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Secondary_Caregiver__c)), Secondary_Caregiver__r.Address_Line_1__c & " " & Secondary_Caregiver__r.Address_Line_2__c & " " & Secondary_Caregiver__r.Address_City__c &" "& TEXT( Secondary_Caregiver__r.Address_State__c ) &" "& TEXT(Secondary_Caregiver__r.County_Address__c) & "" & Secondary_Caregiver__r.Address_ZipCode__c, "" )
CustomField.label: Address Of Secondary Caregiver
